subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Suzann Pettersen won the Hana Bank Kolon Championship in Gyeongju, South Korea, for her fourth L.P.G.A. victory of the year when high wind and unplayable conditions on the putting surfaces forced tournament officials to call off the final round at Mauna Ocean resort. Pettersen opened with a three-under 69 on Friday and shot a 72 on Saturday in wind and cold to take the lead at three under.
